title: Bug 117981Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:1. Select any item in the library outline view.

OB: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the intended item.

EB: The expected behavior is for the item to be selected when clicked on the first attempt.

SR: 
1. Launch the software and open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.
3. Notice that the focus jumps to the library file node.
4. Click on the same item again.
5. Now the item should be selected as expected.
